perturbation.original_text: All amounts owed to Agent hereunder are due within thirty (30) days of the invoice date. Delinquent payments are subject to a late payment charge of one and one half percent (1.5%) per month commencing sixty (60) days from the invoice date.
perturbation.changed_text: All amounts owed to Agent hereunder are due within sixty (60) days of the invoice date. Delinquent payments are subject to a late payment charge of two percent (2%) per month commencing thirty (30) days from the invoice date.
perturbation.explanation: This modification introduces a conflict by shortening the grace period for late payments to 30 days, while simultaneously increasing the late payment charge to 2%. This could potentially violate state usury laws or regulations concerning fair debt collection practices, depending on the jurisdiction and the specific regulations governing late payment fees.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Potential violation of state usury laws or fair debt collection practices.

perturbation.original_text: Client shall, at least one business day prior to mail date, provide immediately available funds sufficient to cover all postage due on such mailing.
perturbation.changed_text: Client shall, at least one hour prior to mail date, provide immediately available funds sufficient to cover all postage due on such mailing.
perturbation.explanation: This change modifies the time frame that the client has to send postage payments, which is a business day to one hour. One hour before mail date is insufficient time for the client to send the money, creating non-compliance issues for the client.

perturbation.original_text: Delinquent payments are subject to a late payment charge of one and one half percent (1.5%) per month commencing sixty (60) days from the invoice date. Client agrees to reimburse Agent for any attorney's fees and any other costs associated with collecting delinquent payments.
perturbation.changed_text: Delinquent payments are subject to a late payment charge of one and one half percent (1.5%) per month commencing sixty (60) days from the invoice date. Client agrees to reimburse Agent for any attorney's fees and any other costs associated with collecting delinquent payments, including a $5,000 non-refundable charge.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a conflict by adding a non-refundable fee. This could potentially violate state laws or regulations concerning fair debt collection practices, depending on the jurisdiction and the specific regulations governing debt collection fees.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Potential violation of state laws or fair debt collection practices.
